You have installed Weave Cloud agents chart!

First, verify all Pods are running:

  kubectl get pods -n {{ .Release.Namespace }} -l weave-cloud-component

Next, login to Weave Cloud (https://cloud.weave.works) and verify your agents are connect to the instance.

If you need help or have any question, you can join our Slack to chat to us â€“ https://slack.weave.works.

Happy hacking!
